"Family, despite Mr. #Muzzo's good intentions, wants no contact (with him)": Crown #yrmuzzo #Muzzo

Defence calls for eight-year sentence, less time served. #yrmuzzo #Muzzo
"Words speak louder than actions. Deeds spoke volumes," says Greenspan #yrmuzzo #Muzzo

"There is no sentence the judge could give to make things right": Greenspan #yrmuzzo #Muzzo
We're back and Greenspan resumes his sentencing statement. #yrmuzzo #Muzzo
The court has recessed for lunch. #Muzzo #yrmuzzo
#Muzzo had no demerit points at the time of the crash: Greenspan #yrmuzzo #Muzzo
"It's difficult to compare tragedy to tragedy, catastrophe to catastrophe": Greenspan #yrmuzzo #Muzzo
"No formulaic" way of determining #Muzzo's sentence: Greenspan #yrmuzzo
More impaired driving charges the result of better enforcement levels: Greenspan #yrmuzzo #Muzzo
"Statistics are difficult to interpret": Greenspan #yrmuzzo #Muzzo
.@YRP drunk driving stats can't be used to determine sentence. Number of charges laid a function of enforcement: Greenspan #yrmuzzo #Muzzo
#Muzzo displays "considerable remorse", shows "no history" of alcohol abuse: Greenspan #yrmuzzo
#Muzzo "did not perceive himself as being drunk": Greenspan #yrmuzzo
Guilt was "something virtually accepted at moment one": Greenspan #yrmuzzo #Muzzo
Numerous letters from family and friends give "insight into the person for whom the tragedy is heartfelt": Greenspan #yrmuzzo #Muzzo
#Muzzo is a "broken man": Greenspan #yrmuzzo
"Media portrayal" is a recurring theme in Greenspan's defence. #yrmuzzo #Muzzo
"He will never be the same": Greenspan, of #Muzzo #yrmuzzo
Character, good deeds of #Muzzo earlier in life should counterbalance the "horror" of the crash: Greenspan #yrmuzzo
#Muzzo is a "boss that works alongside" employees, not above them: Greenspan #yrmuzzo
#Muzzo used to clean off co-workers' cars after snow storms. Would help them fix their vehicles without hesitation: Greenspan #yrmuzzo
#Muzzo comes from a "kindhearted, gracious" family. He's "respectful, friendly... compassionate": Greenspan #yrmuzzo
#Muzzo is "always there for those who are in need": Greenspan, reading a letter from a friend of Muzzo. #yrmuzzo
That's demonstrated by the expediency within the court proceedings. "Four months... is extraordinary": Greenspan #yrmuzzo #Muzzo
Decision to accept responsibility is "virtually unprecedented": Greenspan #yrmuzzo #Muzzo
#Muzzo "understands what he has done", is "willing to accept responsibility": Greenspan #yrmuzzo
#Muzzo neighbour's letter: Media has presented a picture of him contrary to who he actually is. #yrmuzzo
#Muzzo would help neighbour with yard work, carrying groceries, changing a tire in the cold. Neighbour had "many fond memories." #yrmuzzo
"#Muzzo is one of the most humble, genuine people I know": Greenspan, reading a letter from one of Muzzo's friends. #yrmuzzo
Greenspan: There are people in the community who know #Muzzo is a person of "character, decency." #yrmuzzo
Greenspan says #Muzzo accepts responsibility for incident on an "almost unprecedented" scale. #yrmuzzo
#Muzzo was clearly emotional, choked back tears during statement. #yrmuzzo
#Muzzo: "I'm truly sorry." #yrmuzzo
#Muzzo: "I'm tortured" by the incident. #yrmuzzo
He apologizes to the family "from the bottom of my heart." #yrmuzzo #Muzzo
#Muzzo takes the stand. #yrmuzzo
Greenspan acknowledges the "terrible decision" made by a good person. Says #Muzzo has lived an "otherwise exemplary" life. #yrmuzzo
